TopicTitle: TT-38K Radial Decoupler does not connect with booster

Articles.Content:
When I try to add more than one of the TK-38K they won't connect with boosters which I do want to connect. There is always some overlapping whatever I try.

Is this a bug or is there any trick how to connect something accurate to the TK38Ks?

Hi dubAUT, KSP uses a system similar to a file system tree for vessel hierarchy, you can only have one parent part but many children.

You can use struts to add more links, they are a bit like a shortcut to a file from another folder.

So only use one radial decoupler, and use struts for any secondary connections.
